item.title: Welcome and ***R***edaction
item.description: Introductions Name Agency & Team What kind of work/projects do you do? e.g. how do you use R Experience with R why did you learn (do you want to learn) R? what is a fun thing you have used R for? What is DPI’s useR group? Semi-formal, cross agency group of primarily research analyst type folks at all levels of programming/R use/familiarity with statistics.
